title: Ahead of State budget, resident welfare associations demand focus on civic infrastructure
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Resident Welfare Associations (RWAs) are actively voicing their demands.
*   Their primary focus is urging the government to prioritize and improve civic infrastructure.
*   These demands are being made specifically ahead of the upcoming State budget announcement.

title: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Stalin inspects ongoing work on sports complex in Tirupattur
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M.K. Stalin carried out an inspection.
*   The inspection was of ongoing work on a sports complex.
*   The project being inspected is located in Tirupattur.

title: What has government laid down on AI labelling? | Explained
content:
Governments have established new policies or guidelines concerning the labelling of Artificial Intelligence (AI).
*   These measures define how AI-generated content, systems, or services should be identified to users.
*   The headline indicates an accompanying explanation will detail the specifics and implications of these official AI labelling requirements.

title: Union, W.B. Education Ministers spar over NEP, funds
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The Union Education Minister and the West Bengal Education Minister are in a dispute.
*   Their disagreement primarily concerns the National Education Policy (NEP).
*   Funding for education and financial allocations are also key points of contention between them.

title: State level wrestling tournament begins in Bihar
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   A state-level wrestling tournament has commenced.
*   The event is being held in Bihar.
*   It marks the official start of a significant sporting competition in the state.

title: Karnataka govt. can give ‘water guarantee’ if Centre gives requisite permissions: DKS
content:
The Karnataka government is capable of providing a "water guarantee."
*   This initiative is contingent upon receiving the requisite permissions from the Central government.
*   The statement was made by D.K. Shivakumar (DKS).

title: ISRO could relaunch PSLV by June or July: Jitendra Singh
content:
ISRO is considering a relaunch of its Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle (PSLV).
*   The potential timeline for this relaunch is June or July.
*   This information was conveyed by Jitendra Singh.

title: Experts criticise Andhra Pradesh’s health budget allocation for 2026-27
content:
Experts have criticized Andhra Pradesh's approach to its health budget.
*   The criticism specifically targets the allocation of funds for the health sector.
*   This concern relates to the upcoming fiscal years 2026-27.

title: Three MEMU trains in Kerala to add coaches from Feb. 23: Union Minister Suresh Gopi
content:
Additional coaches will be added to three MEMU trains operating in Kerala.
*   This service enhancement is scheduled to commence from February 23.
*   The announcement was made by Union Minister Suresh Gopi.

title: 10 Osmania University students booked following protest
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Ten students from Osmania University.
*   They have been legally booked by authorities.
*   The action follows their involvement in a protest.
